description: Auspicious oriental decor for home! Perfect Chinese traditional gifts!
Also called guardian lions, as one of the auspicious beast in the Chinese faith, is a symbol of success, prosperity, and guardianship.

A male lion is carved with a ball under his claw, symbolizing supreme power and protection of his home; A female lion is carved with a young lion stepped under the claw, symbolizing the prosperity of descendants. With one mouth open and the other closed, wealth is beckoned and guarded.

In ancient times, the Fu Dogs were always put at the gates of Imperial palaces, temples, government offices and homes of important officials. Nowadays, they are still used to guard places and used as home decorations to ward off evil energy, adding a sense of calm and good luck to your home's interior.

The Chinese pronunciation of a lion sounds like the word master, which implies the promotion of career. In folk, it has become a symbol of bravery, strength and auspiciousness, perfect choice as new year's gifts, store opening gifts, house warming gifts.
Fu Dogs Feng Shui item decor for home Wealth Porsperity Figurine.
